mil3.1.7:1.2: “bhante nagasena, yo na patisandahati, nanu so yoniso manasikarena na patisandahati”ti?
mil3.1.7:1.3: “Yoniso ca, maharaja, manasikarena pannaya ca annehi ca kusalehi dhammehi”ti.
mil3.1.7:1.5: “Na hi, maharaja, anno manasikaro, anna panna, imesam kho, maharaja, ajelakagonamahimsaotthagadrabhanampi manasikaro atthi, panna pana tesam natthi”ti.
